15#ifndef DNSSECTOOL_H
16#define DNSSECTOOL_H 1
17
18#include <inttypes.h>
19#include <stdbool.h>
20
21#include <isc/log.h>
22#include <isc/stdtime.h>
23#include <dns/rdatastruct.h>
24#include <dst/dst.h>
25
26typedef void (fatalcallback_t)(void);
27
28ISC_PLATFORM_NORETURN_PRE void
29fatal(const char *format, ...)
30ISC_FORMAT_PRINTF(1, 2) ISC_PLATFORM_NORETURN_POST;
31
32void
33setfatalcallback(fatalcallback_t *callback);
34
35void
36check_result(isc_result_t result, const char *message);
37
38void
39vbprintf(int level, const char *fmt, ...) ISC_FORMAT_PRINTF(2, 3);
40
41ISC_PLATFORM_NORETURN_PRE void
42version(const char *program) ISC_PLATFORM_NORETURN_POST;
43
44void
45sig_format(dns_rdata_rrsig_t *sig, char *cp, unsigned int size);
46#define SIG_FORMATSIZE (DNS_NAME_FORMATSIZE + DNS_SECALG_FORMATSIZE + sizeof("65535"))
47
48void
49setup_logging(isc_mem_t *mctx, isc_log_t **logp);
50
51void
52cleanup_logging(isc_log_t **logp);
53
54dns_ttl_t strtottl(const char *str);
55
56isc_stdtime_t
57strtotime(const char *str, int64_t now, int64_t base,
58 bool *setp);
59
60unsigned int
61strtodsdigest(const char *str);
62
63dns_rdataclass_t
64strtoclass(const char *str);
65
66isc_result_t
67try_dir(const char *dirname);
68
69void
70check_keyversion(dst_key_t *key, char *keystr);
71
72void
73set_keyversion(dst_key_t *key);
74
75bool
76key_collision(dst_key_t *key, dns_name_t *name, const char *dir,
77 isc_mem_t *mctx, bool *exact);
78
79bool
80isoptarg(const char *arg, char **argv, void (*usage)(void));
81
82#ifdef _WIN32
83void InitSockets(void);
84void DestroySockets(void);
85#endif
86
87#endif /* DNSSEC_DNSSECTOOL_H */
88
